page.title: 05CHURCHES
page.content: At SILVINGTON village there is a church,It tells you how old it is in black Iron numbers on the door.Silvington church was built in 1679.It is 306 yEArs old today.The Vicarage is built right next to the church so the Vicer wouldnt have to travel far.People think that it has a secret passage going to the monastery which is now a house which the Millichamps live in.The church is still in use today,But people say it might fall down in about 3 years. FARLOW CHURCH. Farlow church was built in 1857.It tells you how old it is in roman numbers,So we had to work it out. July xv1 MDCCCLV11 M = 1000 Farlow will be 128 years old. D = 500 By Lucy and Andrea. C = 100 L = 50
